mapper.select: SELECT B.b_no, B.title, B.content, M.name as writer, B.regdate, B.viewcnt, B.type, B.del FROM (SELECT b_no, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt, type, del FROM BOARD_TBL WHERE del = 'N' AND type = '1' ORDER BY b_no DESC) B INNER JOIN MEMBER_TBL M ON WRITER = M_NO OFFSET ${start} ROWS FETCH FIRST ${row} ROWS ONLY
SELECT SUM(1) FROM BOARD_TBL WHERE EXISTS(SELECT * FROM BOARD_TBL WHERE TYPE = '1' AND DEL = 'N')

SELECT B.b_no, B.title, B.content, M.name as writer, B.regdate, B.viewcnt, B.type, B.del FROM (SELECT b_no, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt, type, del FROM BOARD_TBL WHERE del = 'N' AND type = '1'
AND title like '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND content like '%'||#{search}||'%'
ORDER BY b_no DESC) B INNER JOIN MEMBER_TBL M ON WRITER = M_NO
WHERE M.name like '%'||#{search}||'%'
WHERE title like '%'||#{search}||'%' OR content like '%'||#{search}||'%' OR M.name like '%'||#{search}||'%'
OFFSET ${start} ROWS FETCH FIRST ${row} ROWS ONLY

SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT b_no, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt, type, del FROM BOARD_TBL WHERE del = 'N' AND type = '1'
AND title like '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND content like '%'||#{search}||'%'
INNER JOIN MEMBER_TBL M ON WRITER = M_NO
WHERE M.name like '%'||#{search}||'%'
WHERE title like '%'||#{search}||'%' OR content like '%'||#{search}||'%' OR M.name like '%'||#{search}||'%'
